con:method.name: GET
con:method.con:description:
The Bill Payment endpoint returns information about the Bill Payment offered for a contract account or a Bill Enquiry Reference Number at a given period of time.
Consumer Number Bill Payment

con:parameter.con:name: enquiryrefnumber
con:parameter.con:description: Utility Reference Number of the Customer

con:parameter.con:name: requestedamount
con:parameter.con:description: Amount Requested by DEWA to be cleared. Only applicable for cheque payment.

con:parameter.con:name: transactiontype
con:parameter.con:description: Type of transaction. The value to be passed as follows Bill Payment Outstanding = BILL, Reference Number Bill Payment =REFB, Estimate Number Payment= ESTM

con:parameter.con:name: paymentmode
con:parameter.con:description: Mode of payment . These are the acceptable modes. Cheque=CQ Cash=CA Credit Card=CC Direct Debit=DD E-Dirham=ED Standing Order=SO BitCoin=BT Others=OT

con:parameter.con:name: requestmode
con:parameter.con:description: Type of transaction. The value to be passed as follows Bill Payment Outstanding = BILL, Reference Number Bill Payment =REFB, Estimate Number Payment= ESTM

con:parameter.con:name: datetime_stamp
con:parameter.con:description: Date Time Stamp of Payment Transaction

con:parameter.con:name: channel
con:parameter.con:description: Channel through which Payment have been made.Channel through which Payment have been made. Mandatory . However third parties are encouraged to fill this field with correct values for proper integrity of data. Valid channels are listed below. Email EMAIL SMS SMS Kiosk Machine KIOSK Cash Deposit Machine CDM Cash Desk CASHDESK Web Based System WEB IVR IVR Mobile MOBILE Auto Debit /Direct Debit AUTOPAY App-IOS IOSAPP App-Andriod ANDAPP App-others APPS Others OTHERS

con:parameter.con:name: terminalnumber
con:parameter.con:description: Terminal No of Payment. It can be considered as any sub-channel, for which information is required.

con:parameter.con:name: terminalinfo
con:parameter.con:description: Terminal Info can considered as a sub part of Terminal No

con:parameter.con:name: bankcode
con:parameter.con:description: Bank code is required for Cheque payments. Bank codes can be provided by DEWA, during project initiation phase, if the agency does not have the list. Mandatory for Cheque.

con:parameter.con:name: txsequencenumber
con:parameter.con:description: Unique transaction sequence number provided by Bank or Agency
